title: DSWO Coimbatore Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Specialists and Other Posts
description: The District Social Welfare Office (DSWO)has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Specialists, Multi-Tasking Staff Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, 12th, and Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the DSWO Coimbatore Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. If you are looking for more, here is a list ...
